roleset.name: not appropriate, fitting
roleset.note: UNSUITABLE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, suit-v.01. (from unsuitable.01-j)

roles.note: Arg0 occurs with the verb but doesn't occur with 'unsuitable'. (from unsuitable.01-j)

example.name: both args
example.text: I have not seen any material as to why-1 the 50 + population is unsuitable for this vaccine [*-1].
